actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose an excise tax on fuels containing sulfur and on certain emissions of sulfur oxides.

summary.text: Imposes an excise tax under the Internal Revenue Code on fuels containing sulphur and on emissions of sulphur oxides from a stationary source into the atmosphre. Exempts the excise tax upon fuels sold to a manufacturer, producer, or importer for resale by him.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose an excise tax on fuels containing sulfur and on certain emissions of sulfur oxides.
